Summary: It looks like a star but red like Venus and it bounces like a ping pong ball.
divs: Sighting DetailsI seen this flashing red, blue, green object in the sky around 11:p.m. Upon closer examination I noticed that it took the form of a triangle which was surrounded by the lights mentioned above. I took pictures of the object. The next night, I took a video of the object and then noticed that in the sky it looked like it stood in one place but when I looked into the camera lense, the object began bouncing around like a ping pong ball. I managed to capture pictures and videos of it. I remember feeling very curious to know what that orb was and to this day as I still see it every night. I never lost sight of it yet, it is still here.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Winnipeg
There was one other sighting in Winnipeg on or around August 9th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
